width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Sangeet Celebration” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:70|text_align:left|color:%230a0a0a” google_fonts=”font_family:Lobster%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInRight”]

Sangeet Function at weddings has become an essential part of weddings and every family; every Bride Groom wants to celebrate this function filled with memories and emotions uniquely and creatively. The members of the family want to showcase their dance talent, or they wish to express their feelings through dance, and that is the sole reason why this function is essential

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” kd_fixed_background=”true” kd_image_overlay=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1602960868028{background-image: url(https://archievents.in/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/inline_image_preview.jpg?id=8317) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Why Archi Events?” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:70|text_align:left” google_fonts=”font_family:Lobster%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeInLeft”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInLeft”]

Archi Events properly understands the dream and passion of its client when it comes to a Sangeet Celebration. The Technically specialized staff and innovative team efficiently manages and provides that unique arrangement of Sangeet to become unique and memorable in every way possible. Our team converts your Sangeet into a special one and make sure it is impressive and executed with zero error.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”8314″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right” style=”vc_box_border_circle” border_color=”black” css_animation=”fadeInRight”][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” kd_fixed_background=”true” kd_image_overlay=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1602961147920{background: #ffffff url(https://archievents.in/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/119627-white-and-gold-abstract-background-image.jpg?id=7867) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_single_image image=”8315″ img_size=”1200*825″ style=”vc_box_border” border_color=”black”][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Services we Provide” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:70|text_align:center|color:%230a0a0a” google_fonts=”font_family:Lobster%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInRight”]

  • Anchor
  • Choreographer
  • Sound System
  • Effect Lights
  • LED Screen
  • Special Effects
  • Photography
  • Indian Dance Troop
  • Foreign Dance Troop
  • Foreign Dance Performance
  • Special Bride & Groom Entry
  • Special Ring Ceremony Concepts
  • Catering Services
  • Venue Selection
  • And Many More Services ……..

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
